column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came here on a Saturday night
column2: when the line was out the door and the expected wait was over an hour. Luckily
column3: they had personal sized deep dish pizzas available for take-out
column4: so we didn't have to wait at all
column5: but just took the pizzas back to our hotel room! Very convenient and a good business strategy.
